question:
With reference to the recent developments regarding the Assam Gas Cracker project, consider the following statements:
  1. It is included in the Assam Accord.
  2. It is for production of ethylene.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Assam Gas Cracker Project was initiated for the socioeconomic development of the north- east region. It is considered as a part of the Assam accord. It was in news recently when the government approved the transfer of its implementing organisation, BCPL or Brahmaputra Cracker and Polymer Ltd, from the chemicals and petrochemicals ministry to the petroleum and natural gas ministry. Â Statement 2 is correct: The Assam Gas Cracker Project was established for manufacturing ethylene. About 2 lakh tonnes of the compound can be produced by the project using feedstock gas. It is the first petrochemical project in the north- eastern part of India.
